name: Kaskus Fixups Aero
description:
Current Version : 0.08 - This Beautiful Aero Styles made for the Kaskus Online Forum (www.kaskus.us)
note : for installing this version in Opera you must download this addons in your opera browser https://addons.opera.com/en/addons/extensions/details/easy-user-css/1.3/?display=en
And copy paste the css style(code) below to that addons.
additional_info:
[changelog][only 2 recents changelog will be shown]
Kaskus Fixups Aero 0.08
- Recode The Aero Style, now it's look like the real Aero!
- Reupload background image to flickr.
- Fixed link color in posts.
- Fixed aero functions when replying post.
- Fixed text color and aero functions in Kaskus Term of Services.
- Added New Screenshots

Kaskus Fixups Aero 0.07
- Background image now support for all monitor resolution!
- Kaskus Fixups Aero now support for Firefox, Opera, and Chrome!
- Recode body style, for increasing performance load time.
- Fixed aero functions when quoting a post.
- Fixed border style and text hide while wraping CODE tag.
- Fixed border style in all subforums. 
note : for installing this version in Opera you must download this addons in your opera browser https://addons.opera.com/en/addons/extensions/details/easy-user-css/1.3/?display=en
And copy paste the css style(code) below to that addons.

I need your feedback, you can meet me at kaskus.us http://www.kaskus.us/member.php?u=550451
